review: Excellent. The clinic is equipped with good facelities. The doctors are very experienced and kind. I feel much better after the treatment.

She doesn't value for patient time, is always a hour late in her appointments. She is most of the time missing and her husband attends the patient in her place. She doesn't have any control over her staff and they hardly care to listen to her due to her negligence. In all I would suggest all to avoid her if possible.
